system.description: At 14th level, you create or are entrusted with the stewardship of a sacred space. You gain a single grade 3 stronghold of average quality which must be of the Menagerie, Sacred Grove, or Temple type for free. You are unable to sell this special stronghold. You also gain a single seasoned follower of the Apothecary, Cook, Diviner, Healer, or Sage type to assist you and act as the sacred site’s steward while you are away. At the Narrator’s discretion, this stronghold may occupy some exotic location. You gain an expertise die to Nature made while occupying this stronghold.
